name: Cat's Trophy!
description:
In Cat's trophy you play as one of the two cats - Tobu or Cheti, and your objective is to eat as many fish as possible without getting hit by falling spiked blocks. Both cats have different powers and personalities - Cheti can run around really fast and can fly! Tobu can only float and is a little slower, but he gets higher bonus on every fish he eats.

Controls:
Direction keys to move around.
Press space to select the chosen character.
Hold space to float (for Tobu).
Jump to the main menu at any time using the Esc key.
Press R to play again if you lose.

Credits:
Art, Game Programming, Music: Anvit Srivastav
Concept, Gameplay and design: Subashini Venkatakrishnan
